title: T205 HOFs - price drop - new added
author: mybuddyinc

posts.post_title: T205 HOFs - price drop - new added
posts.post_content:
The following 11 T205 HOFs are for sale at $60 each.  

Paypal gift (regular is also fine, if that is more comfortable for you), or check/mo.  Free s/h.

Bender -- SOLD
Bresnahan (closed mouth) -- SOLD
Brown  -- SOLD
Chance
Clarke 
Collins (closed mouth) -- SOLD
Duffy
Marquard -- SOLD
McGraw -- SOLD
Wallace (cap) -- SOLD
Wheat  -- SOLD


If interested, email me at [url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url].  No PMs please, they confuse me :confused::rolleyes:

Joe
